sense.gloss: unsophisticated, ruggedly honest, artless, unaffected, simple, naive
slowness of speech, awkwardness of speech

sdata.j: トムは↑一言↑↓ひとこと↓↑一言↑↓ひとこと↓を↑噛↑↓か↓み↑締↑↓し↓めるように↑訥々↑↓とつとつ↓と↑語↑↓かた↓った。
sdata.e: Tom spoke stutteringly, thinking about every word he was going to say.

words.gloss: unsophisticated, ruggedly honest, artless, unaffected, simple, naive
slowness of speech, awkwardness of speech
